title: Typophile Detective Work: Help Find Hit & Run Driver
content:
Sorry if this has been posted, but I didn’t see anything. Found this over on digg.com and thought I would see if any of our super type sleuths could come up with something.

[Help crack the case.](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130547/http:/jalopnik.com/5350298/id-this-partial-logo-help-find-a-hit-and-run-suspect)
author: Trick

comments.content: I was just about to post this - thanks :) I’m going to change the title slightly, BTW.

Thanks Zara, that is more descriptive.

There is also a reward being offered [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130547/http:/www.kcci.com/news/20684157/detail.html#)

Patrick

[Bonnie](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130547/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=221771) identified the font already either as [Improv](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130547/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/improv/regular/) from ICG or probably [Kurt Russell font](http://web.archive.org/web/20090913130547/http:/www.dafont.com/kurt-russell.font?nb_ppp=50&psize=l&text=H+E). No help on the logo so far.
